# Header Standards

## Required Format

```markdown
# Document Title

**Created**: YYYY-MM-DD
**Updated**: YYYY-MM-DD
**Status**: [emoji] [description]
**Priority**: High/Medium/Low

---
```

## Status Values

| ðŸš§ | In Progress | Active |
| ðŸ“‹ | Planned | Future |
| ðŸ”„ | Active | Living doc |
